entry.title: Neonify HTB CTF SSTI + Regex bypass

link.title: Neonify HTB CTF SSTI + Regex bypass

entry.summary: Neonify CTF Writeup Neonify CTF is one provided by HTB under the WEB portion of CTF Challenges. It’s quite a simple, beginner friendly CTF. Manual Analysis Checking Available Subpages Considering that vulnerability scanning tools were 0 help, I manually start checking the website. After entering it for the first time, I realize that the index page is the only one accessible by the user, and...
